DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether anastrozole ODF bioequivalent Arimidex tablet single oral administration anastrozole formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Comparing Arimidex Tablet Anastrozole ODF Japanese Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomised , Open label , Single centre , 2 way Crossover Bioequivalence Study Comparing Arimidex Tablet 1 mg Anastrozole Orally Rapid Disintegration Film Formula 1 mg After Single Oral Administration Japanese Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedures Japanese healthy male subject age 20 45 year Male subject willing use barrier contraception ie , condom , 3 month last dose investigational product Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 27 kg/m2 History clinically significant disease disorder History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma Any clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , haematology urinalysis result
